title: Polki and Ruby Enamelled Jhumka - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Seed Pearls. Features traditional Hyderabadi gold polish for a rich antique lustre.
features: Classic Jhumka design featuring intricately set Polki diamonds in a closed setting to accentuate their brilliance. The dome shape is embellished with teardrop polkis and open gold work. Delicate ruby and pearl droplets add movement and a touch of vibrant color. The ear stud is designed as a clover with polki work.
description: A masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship with genuine polki diamonds. The antique gold polish gives it a heirloom quality, making it a valuable addition to your jewellery collection. The contrast between the diamonds and the vibrant ruby beads is striking and perfect for a traditional bride.
